dcterms:description: A publicly available dataset containing 24,606 tweets, with annotations indicating the presence or absence of Adverse Drug Reactions (ADR).
dcterms:title: Twitter Dataset for Adverse Drug Reactions

dcterms:creator: TwitterGloVe
dcterms:description: TwitterGloVe is a pre-trained word embedding model trained on a large corpus of tweets, used for word representation in the context of NLP tasks.
dcterms:title: TwitterGloVe

dcterms:creator: Orest Xherija
dcterms:description: A dataset used for classification of medication-related tweets, focusing on the classification of tweets related to medication.
dcterms:title: Medication-related Tweets Dataset
